text:
```
**VizBot.JS** 
 Welcome to the Vizbot.JS help system 
 ---------- 
 All commands are prefaced by a greater than symbol (>) and must be
 written in lower case E.G >help would bring up this help menu. 
 
 >? 
 >kick
 >warn 
 >add
 >subtract
 >multiply
 >divide
 >say 
 >purge
 >avatarurl
 >dice
 >about
 >aboutlong
 >gen
 >yeahbaby 
 >verygrr
 >horny
 >yomama
 >strat
 >bottest
 ----------
 You can get further help by typing the command followed by an underscore then the word help E.G >help_help```
helphelp: Brings up the full help menu
helpkick: Kicks the mentioned user from the Discord server.
helpwarn: Provides a written warning for the mentioned user.
helpadd: Provides a total sum of the numbers provided.
helpsubtract: Provides a total based on the subtraction of provided numbers.
helpmultiply: Provides a total based on the multiplication of provided numbers.
helpdivide: Provides a total based on the division of provided numbers.
helpsay: Makes the bot repeat user submitted text.
helppurge: Purges the chat of the last 100 messages (Usably by Super Admins only)
helpavatar: Provides the user with a link to their discord avatar.
helpdice: Rolls two dice and presents the user with the result.
helpbottest: Bot should reply with a test confirmation message.
helpabout: Provides the abbreviated github commit number.
helpaboutlong: Provides the long github commit number.
helpgen: Generates a random string 10 characters long.
helpyomama: Generate a random yomama joke from a stored list of yomama jokes
helpstrat: Generates a random strat from a stored list of strats
